entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
